subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Jordan Eberle scored the tying goal with five seconds left in the third period, then scored the winner in a shootout Saturday night to give Canada a 6-5 victory over Russia in the semifinals of the world junior championship in Ottawa.
snippet: Jordan Eberle scored the tying goal with five seconds left in the third period, then scored the winner in a shootout Saturday night to give Canada a 6-5 victory over Russia in the semifinals of the world junior championship in Ottawa.
